## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.SET\_MODEL\_TEXTURE\_URI" property

Emitted when the texture uri of the entity's model is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.SET_MODEL_TEXTURE_URI]: {
        entity: Entity;
        modelTextureUri: string | undefined;
    };
```
